name: For Adventure
description:
Lucas and his family have been living life on the farm ever since he came into this world.

One day, he gets inspired to become a fully-fledged Adventurer!

Join Lucas as he embarks on his journey to reach the top and become the best Adventurer in the world!

*****

This is a prototype that gives an idea of what this game is going for and not a complete experience. There are lots of unfinished/missing features that would help better represent this idea. Nevertheless, feel free to give your thoughts/opinions/advice in the current state that it's in, or if you come across any bugs/glitches. I give more details in the devlog so check that out to hear more. 

Gameplay is first-person with elements inspired by Skyrim.

The playtime is around 10-15 minutes.

If the game is running slow or lags at all, set the quality to Medium or Low.
